rooms.description: A welcoming open area with traditional Kerala style architectural elements such as wooden beams and intricate carvings.
Spacious living room designed for family gatherings, featuring local woodwork and large windows for natural lighting, aligned per Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room, this dining area is designed with traditional Kerala motifs and natural materials.
Modern yet traditional kitchen integrated with open layout; uses local stones and tiles that respect Vastu principles for placement and flow of energy.
A compact bathroom designed with waterproof finishes, tiled floors, and natural lighting to ensure functionality and alignment with traditional aesthetics.
A dedicated home theater room equipped with modern audio-visual systems, soundproofing, and subtle traditional accents. The placement is considered to maintain positive Vastu energy.

This suite includes a living area, bedroom, and an office space within a multifunctional penthouse design. Traditional Kerala style elements are integrated for cultural authenticity while ensuring modern functionality.

openings.location: Living Room and Studio Apartment Suite
openings.description: Large, casement windows that allow natural light while providing ample ventilation.
